Title: Ancient Greek and Roman Statues Were More Than Eye Candy—They Were Also Perfumed
Description: Thousands of years ago, Greco-Roman statues offered viewers a multi-dimensional experience that also called to our olfactory senses.

Title: Mexico City bans violent bullfighting, sparking fury and celebration
Description: The decision sparked angry protests from bullfighting supporters and matadors, some of whom tried to breach a police barricade at the local Congress.

Description:

Title: Palmer Luckey's take on the 'ludicrously expensive' Vision Pro
Description: The Oculus founder discussed the "ludicrously expensive" Apple Vision Pro, which retails for $3,500, on a podcast.

Title: I've visited celebrity-loved ski towns in Italy and Colorado. Here's where to go if you want to feel like an A-lister without breaking the bank.
Description:
Aspen, Colorado, and Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy, attract celebrities and wealthy travelers.
I've visited both and prefer the more affordable ski town.

Title: Russian drone hits Ukraine hospital after Putin, Trump agree to partial ceasefire
Description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said overnight missile and drone attacks launched by Russia showed that Moscow's claimed support for a ceasefire in Ukraine is not "real."

Title: Home Depot shows off new smart home products arriving later this year
Description: Home Depot has revealed several new products coming to its shelves in 2025, including a new smart bulb and a smart smoke alarm from Ring and Kidde.

Title: Chromebooks are about to get a lot smarter, and more accessible
Description:
The latest stable build of Chrome OS removes Google Assistant and installs the Gemini chatbot.
It also adds a new accessibility feature called Slow Keys.

Title: What You Should Know before Your First Colonoscopy
Description:

A gastroenterologist sets the record straight.
